summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by removing decorative hero background usage and keeping the existing CTA scroll behavior. REQ-2 updates the About section to reference an uploaded JPG, but the diff does not show the uploaded image being added as a static asset. Additionally, the diff includes broader global theme/color changes and metadata/state updates not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add one of the uploaded images (IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-2.jpg, IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-3.jpg, or IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-4.jpg) as a static asset and use it as the About image source.
missing_requirements.reason: The About section now references /assets/IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-2.jpg, but the diff shows no new asset file added (Added: 0). Without an added file, it is not evidenced that the uploaded photo is actually present in the frontend static assets.

hallucinated_features.description: Global redesign of CSS theme variables/palette (professional neutral palette, dark mode palette, chart colors, etc.) beyond removing the hero decorative background.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to remove hero background designs and swap the About image; it explicitly lists non-goals including not changing copy/navigation and does not request a broader theme/palette overhaul.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to internal tracking/summary files (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; these changes do not directly implement REQ-1/REQ-2.
